title: Flow state.
paragraphs: Scandinavian minimal. German precision. QX adapts to your rhythm, not the other way around. Sustainably built and engineered to break the mold.
Build it your way. Infinite modularity, integrated cable routing, zero clutter. The ultimate setup for creators, coders, and visionaries.
